reasoning: CIN (all grades: CIN 1, 2, 3) detection rate from cervical screening programs globally. Estimated ~400 per 100k women screened per year based on WHO/HPV screening data circa 2005. Includes all grades of dysplasia. High geographic variation based on HPV prevalence and screening coverage.
source: Schiffman M et al. (2007). Human papillomavirus and cervical cancer. Lancet. 370:890-907
